R.ROOM_NO LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%')

SELECT R.ROOM_INT_NO, R.TYPE_NO, R.ROOM_NO, R.IMG, R.TYPE_NAME, R.COMMON_PRICE, U.ROOM_USE_NO, U.BOOK_NO, U.TOTAL_PRICE, U.ROOM_INT_NO, U.START_DATE, U.END_DATE FROM (SELECT I.ROOM_INT_NO, I.TYPE_NO, I.ROOM_NO, I.IMG, T.TYPE_NAME, T.COMMON_PRICE FROM ROOM_INTRODUCE I JOIN ROOM_TYPE T ON I.TYPE_NO=T.TYPE_NO) R JOIN (SELECT U.ROOM_USE_NO, U.BOOK_NO, U.TOTAL_PRICE, L.ROOM_INT_NO, L.START_DATE, L.END_DATE FROM ROOM_USE U JOIN BOOK_LIST L ON U.BOOK_NO = L.NO) U ON U.ROOM_INT_NO = R.ROOM_INT_NO
#{date} BETWEEN U.START_DATE AND U.END_DATE-1
R.ROOM_NO LIKE ('%'||#{searchValue}||'%')

SELECT R.ROOM_INT_NO, R.TYPE_NO, R.ROOM_NO, R.IMG, R.TYPE_NAME, U.ROOM_USE_NO, U.BOOK_NO, U.TOTAL_PRICE, U.ROOM_INT_NO, TO_CHAR(U.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(U.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR((U.END_DATE - U.START_DATE)*R.COMMON_PRICE, 2, INSTR((U.END_DATE - U.START_DATE)*R.COMMON_PRICE, ' ') - 1)) AS COMMON_PRICE FROM (SELECT I.ROOM_INT_NO, I.TYPE_NO, I.ROOM_NO, I.IMG, T.TYPE_NAME, T.COMMON_PRICE FROM ROOM_INTRODUCE I JOIN ROOM_TYPE T ON I.TYPE_NO=T.TYPE_NO) R JOIN (SELECT U.ROOM_USE_NO, U.BOOK_NO, U.TOTAL_PRICE, L.ROOM_INT_NO, L.START_DATE, L.END_DATE FROM ROOM_USE U JOIN BOOK_LIST L ON U.BOOK_NO = L.NO) U ON U.ROOM_INT_NO = R.ROOM_INT_NO WHERE ROOM_USE_NO = #{NO}
